Death Grips.
First song I ever heard was Guillotine and I was astounded that these guys were getting so much acclaim. But then I heard the hook on The Fever and never looked back.
Closer by Nine Inch Nails would make a DIRTY beat, dat bassline.
DAE REAL HIPHOP? DANCING WITH THE DEVIL [LE]TERALLY GAVE ME GOOSEBUMPS GAIZ

Basically there is always a certain number of beats of a certain type (whole, half, quarter, eighth, etc.) in a bar.
The names of the notes correspond to how much of a bar they each take up in 4/4 (a quarter note takes up a quarter of a bar.)
The top number in a time sig represents the number of notes in the bar and the bottom number represents the type of note. So for example, a bar of 4/4 would contain 4 quarter notes.
There also exist time signatures in eights such as 6/8 or 10/8, these are basically just the quarter note signatures in double time. (6/8 = 3/4 and 10/8 = 5/4.)
The hook in this song is in 10/8 time, so if you count you'll notice that it goes "ONE two three four five, ONE two three four five." (VERY quickly though.)

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like a huge weight has been lifted off of me
WRITING.TEXT: I've finally started turning my life around. Over the past year I've been a terrible person to so many people around me. I made fun of less popular kids, I was a huge douche to my ex, I selfishly scared the crap out of my family with my benzodiazepine addiction back at the end of 2012, and I've just been a terrible person in general. But, last night, after seeing someone who I've been unpleasant to in the past go through a nervous breakdown, something clicked. I was up all night writing heartfelt apologies to everyone I have ever wronged, some of them being multiple paragraphs long, I assured everyone that they were amazing and that they deserved to be happy, no matter what. The next day, I spontaneously hugged my mom and told her how much I loved her, and I tried to apologize to my brother for years of verbal abuse but he just sort of shrugged me off. But other than him, everyone else responded, they all forgave me and made me feel so much better, I was crying. I'm sorry for the bad formatting/grammar I'm just so excited and I didn't know where else to post this. Today is day one.
Technically it's 6/8, depending on how you count the pulse. Spaceship by Ye and Lost Boys by Death Grips are also 3/4 or 6/8
A lot of rap is shuffle actually, My First Song by Jay Z. Sandwitches by Tyler can be counted as a fast shuffle

WRITING.TITLE: Good moderately price phone repair?
WRITING.TEXT: I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 that I stupidly managed to crack (I was too proud to use a case,) and all the places I've been looking at that offer replacements all price them at around 300$! (More than I paid for the actual phone!) Does anyone know a good place in Ottawa that doesn't require payment of my first born child? (OEM parts are preferred.) Thanks in advance!
